getInputResource

java.lang.String getInputResource(java.lang.String relPath)
Gets a URI string for the relative path relPath. I've tried to make this as robust as possible. Behavior seems to depend on whether the application is run from a jar or not and on the operating system. -- MO

Parameters:
relPath - a relative URI path, which uses '/' as separator.
Returns:
a URI string for the relative path relPath.
